name: crc1607_ms_v1_protappro
displayName: The specific method used to analyze the proteome. If not in the list, select Other and fill it in the next field.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_assaykit
displayName: The title of the kit/biologicals used.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_doe
displayName: date or a rough date when the assay was performed

name: crc1607_ms_v1_sampleinfo
displayName: A category header for the sample information.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_samplegrp
displayName: A label to categorize the samples, such as "Control", "Treatment", "Disease", or "Healthy". or collection time points, etc.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_sampleid
displayName: Self-defined sample ID(s). Make sure it is the same when entering the sample metadata.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_organism
displayName: The species from which samples were derived.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_sampletyp
displayName: A description of the physical nature of the sample.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_samplerepl
displayName: The number of independent samples for each group.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_targetprot
displayName: A category header for the detailed target protein information.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_otcprotinfo
displayName: If not using Uniprot as protein ontology, please add the name of database and protein identifier.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_protstatus
displayName: The status of the protein being studied.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_prothostspec
displayName: The organism from which the protein was produced. If not in the list, select Other and fill it in the next field.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_fractionation
displayName: A Yes/No field indicating if the sample was separated into different fractions before MS analysis to reduce its complexity.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_digestion
displayName: The method used to break down the proteins into peptides.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_ptmgroup
displayName: The specific post-translational modifications being studied. If not in the list, select Other and fill it in the next field.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_qc
displayName: A list of method that was performed to ensure the quality of samples or/and data.
column5: Internal QCs and external QC samples.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_relvpaper
displayName: Link or DOI of the literature that is relevant to this experiment.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_finddata
displayName: (For metadata provider) Local path, folder name where data are store, private repository, etc. (For sharing) path in shared folder, link to public repository, etc.

name: crc1607_ms_v1_notes
displayName: Notes about this experiment. Either for fellow researchers or to the metadata provider in the future.
